name: Public Panic
description: Your country is not prepared for the pandemic. The news of an unknown deadly virus being spread around the country has caused people to panic. People are asking the gvoernment to put a stop to the chaos.

choiceOne.description: Make public speechs and educate the public about the virus

log.content: The public calmed down after the government's education campaign, but many people has already potentially contacted the virus amid the chaos.

choiceTwo.description: Arrest people on the street and enforce curfew

log.content: People stopped panicking and started staying home after many has been arrested. Foreign governments condemn your country for your strict enforcement.

name: Karen's Outrage
description: A group of Karens are claiming that quarantine rules are an infringement to their rights, and they are taking it on the streets to protest against the government.

log.content: The Karens are satisfied and stopped protesting. Business owners are happy that the rules are less strict, but it comes with the risk of spreading the virus with more human contact.
The Karens are cleaned off the street, foreign governments are denouncing your action as oppression.

name: Cry For Help
description: A poor neighbouring country is asking for your assistance to help them combat the pandemic.

log.content: Your neighbouring country is very thankful of your help, your diplomatic relationship has improved significantly, with the cost being quite a bit of money and supply.
Your diplomatic relationship with your neighbouring country has worsen.

name: Misinformation
description: Conspiracy theorists are spreading misinformation on the internet, leading to many people refusing to wear masks and claim that 5G towers are the cause of the pandemic. If this isn't dealt with quickly, it could lead to serious consequences.

choiceOne.description: Arrest those who are spreading misinformation

log.content: Those who are spreading false information on the internet are arrested. Their supporters claim that them being arrested was a government cover up. Foreign enemies claim this is 'suppression of free speech'.
You spent quite a budget to run an anti-misinformation campaign to educate the public, it was successful for the most part, but you can't wake up someone who's pretending to sleep.

name: Toilet Paper Crisis
description: People are panick buying toilet paper for some reason. The toilet paper supply chain is getting overwhelmed and asking you for direction.

log.content: You released an order limiting the sales of toilet paper to a maximum of 1 roll per person per day.

choiceTwo.description: Mass produce low quality toilet paper

log.content: The increased supply of toilet paper still couldn't satisfy the overwhelming demand, many people rush to stores to hoard up toilet paper, without regard for the risk of contacting the virus.

name: Karen's Outrage II: Electric Boogaloo
description: Karens are throwing a tantrum because stores are denying them from entering without wearing a mask, claiming that it is an infringement of their rights.

choiceOne.description: Force the stores to let the Karens in

log.content: Stores are now forced to open their doors to people with no masks on.
New laws are released allowing store owners to refuse service to customers with no masks on. Karens are very upset and used this oppurtunity to bash your government with foreign media.
